long_description: Need a little boost in your busy day? Whether you're hiking, biking or commuting, the Chia Squeeze Drink from Mamma Chia gives you a nutritious, tasty lift with the natural nutrition of chia seeds. Also contains strawberries, banana and beets. Organic, non-GMO, gluten free and vegan, this Chia Squeeze Drink provides dietary fiber and 1200mg Omega-3s. In addition to Omega-3s and fiber, chia seeds offer protein, antioxidants and minerals; Mamma Chia hydrates organic chia seeds for even better absorption of the nutrients. Each Squeeze contains 70 calories.
short_description: Need a little boost in your busy day? Whether you're hiking, biking or commuting, the Chia Squeeze Drink from Mamma Chia gives you a nutritious, tasty lift with the natural nutrition of chia seeds.
